description:
OpenAI is facing diminishing returns with its latest AI model while navigating the pressures of recent investments. According to The Information, OpenAI’s next AI model – codenamed Orion – is delivering smaller performance gains compared to its predecessors. In employee testing, Orion reportedly achieved the performance level of GPT-4 after completing just 20% of its... Read more »

The post OpenAI faces diminishing returns with latest AI model appeared first on AI News.
title: OpenAI faces diminishing returns with latest AI model
